name: career-fit-scoring-app
description: Electron desktop app for resume scoring using career-fit-scoring algorithm

scripts.dev: npm run build:electron:dev && concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:all && electron-builder
scripts.build:win: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('icon.ico')){console.error('ERROR: icon.ico not found in current directory!'); process.exit(1);} console.log('icon.ico found:', fs.realpathSync('icon.ico'));" && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:win:publish: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const iconPath=path.join(process.cwd(),'icon.ico'); console.log('Current dir:', process.cwd()); console.log('Looking for icon.ico at:', iconPath); if(!fs.existsSync(iconPath)){console.error('ERROR: icon.ico not found!'); process.exit(1);} console.log('âœ“ icon.ico found:', fs.realpathSync(iconPath));" && npm run build:all && electron-builder --win --publish onTag
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build:win:publish && npm run generate-latest
scripts.build:win:complete: npm run build:win:publish && npm run generate-latest
